testsuite.name: com.company.promotions.search.api.promotions.application.FindProductsPriceBetweenDatesUseCaseIT

testcase.name: Test 3: Request at 21:00 on day 14 - should return base price (only one applies)
Should return correct date range in response
Test 1: Request at 10:00 on day 14 - should return base price (only one applies)
Test 2: Request at 16:00 on day 14 - should return promotional price (smallest range)
Should return empty for non-existent product
Should return empty when no price applies
Should return empty for non-existent brand
Test 4: Request at 10:00 on day 15 - should return promotional price (smallest range)
Test 5: Request at 21:00 on day 16 - should return late promotional price
